itunes:title: Episode 345 - Brothers In Arms
title: Episode 345 - Brothers In Arms
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with Eli Cuevas to discuss his brand new show with Vincent "Rocco" Vargas on the History Channel airing tomorrow night at 10pm EST, "Brothers In Arms."  Eli chats about what it's like being a veteran working in Hollywood, how man...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with Eli Cuevas to discuss his brand new show with Vincent "Rocco" Vargas on the History Channel airing tomorrow night at 10pm EST, "Brothers In Arms."  Eli chats about what it's like being a veteran working in Hollywood, how many kids Rocco actually has, and how impossible is to get a show about guns on television in today's day and age.  This is a special Bonus episode for everyone with a long drive this week!
